hero.title: Save The
hero.description: Report animals in need, connect with local helpers, and track vaccinated dogs in the beautiful Agadir-Taghazout coastal region.
hero.imageAlt: Dog on the beach of Taghazout

mission.title: Protecting Stray Dogs in Agadir & Taghazout
mission.description: Save The Paws is a community-driven initiative to tag, vaccinate, and rescue stray dogs along Morocco's beautiful Atlantic coast. We connect tourists, locals, and animal lovers to make a real difference -- one paw at a time.

features.title: What You Can Do
features.description: Explore the tools that help protect stray dogs in the region.

taggedDogs.title: See Tagged Dogs
taggedDogs.description: Browse all registered and vaccinated dogs in the community.

sos.title: SOS Emergency
sos.description: Report injured or endangered animals that need immediate help.

reportStray.title: Report a Stray
reportStray.description: Spot an untagged dog? Let us know so we can help.

adopt.title: Adopt a Dog
adopt.description: Give a rescued dog a forever home. Browse dogs ready for adoption.

reportTypes.title: How You Can Help
reportTypes.description: Report animals in different situations ‚Äì from rescued dogs to emergencies.

stray.title: Report a Stray
stray.description: Dogs without ear tags that need help.

vaccination.title: Promote
vaccination.description: Request vaccination and neutering for this dog.

map.description: Discover all reported dogs in the Agadir-Taghazout region. Click on a paw for more details.

donation.title: Support Save The Paws
donation.description: Save The Paws relies entirely on donations to rescue and care for animals. Your support makes a difference!
donation.afterReport: Your report helps us help animals. Save The Paws runs entirely on donations ‚Äì please consider supporting our work.

community.title: Our Community
community.description: Together we care for stray dogs in the Agadir-Taghazout region.

helperCta.title: Become a Helper!
helperCta.description: As a helper, you can see SOS reports, approve submissions, and actively help rescue animals.

footer.madeWith: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è for the animals in Agadir & Taghazout

application.title: Your Application

application.hint: Share your motivation and any relevant experience.

status.pendingDesc: Your application is being reviewed by an admin. We'll get back to you soon!
status.approvedDesc: Welcome to the team! You can now see SOS reports and approve submissions.
status.rejectedDesc: Unfortunately, your application was rejected. Contact us if you have questions.

pwa.installDescription: Add to your home screen for quick access
pwa.iosInstructions: Tap the share button and 'Add to Home Screen'
pwa.alreadyInstalledDesc: You can access Save The Paws directly from your home screen.

pwa.androidStep2: Select "Install app" or "Add to Home screen"
